description:
Sunraku receives the consequences of his defeat of Lycagon`s shade, and as the group moves on to Fifticia to meet with Rust and Mold, another new twist awaits him.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, Part 5
Taishi no Tomoshibi o Idaite: Sono Go
大志の灯火を抱いて 其の五
